about-1: Tomorrow’s Brain (TB) Limited is an EdTech company offering personalized and adaptive assessments and trainings focused on (language and literacy) foundational skills that navigate child development.
about-2: Over the past decade, Professor Shelley Xiuli Tong and her research team at the Speech, Language and Reading Lab of the University of Hong Kong has delved into the science of learning in the neurodivergent population through educational neuroscience and machine learning approaches. The TB team extends these innovations to the development of the state-of-the-art educational products tailored to individuals’ unique learning needs and preferences. Our goal is to foster holistic growth and excellence in individuals and families scientifically, sparking a future of equity in education.
mission: Our mission is to transform education by:
mission-1: Developing personalized and adaptive assessment and training for all children
mission-2: Leveraging AI and brain-based tools to optimize the learning of and teaching for children
mission-3: Providing accessible and sustainable education for children with different learning needs
